page.title: 05SHERWOOD HOUSE NEWTON ST.C.
page.content: Sherwood House is owned by Mr.and Mrs.J.Quicke.There are {22 rooms {including 11 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. We noticed a{piano made in 1820,}a {Chinese musical box,}a Chinese chest of drawers and{many old paintings. { The owners live mainly in two rooms {downstairs and two upstairs,since {their six children are now grown up. Mrs. Quicke allowed us to report that her bed was tilted because she suffered from varicose veins! The house,built in 1907,is on four sides of a courtyard,the beautiful, grounds have{unusual plants and trees in a wild setting.{The deer - and the {giant wood ants,which infest the area {- are a nuisance.}There are pyramid shaped hedges, a summer house still in use,and a lot of beehives.There are two fish ponds.
